required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of SHR4010 in Patients With Hemodialysis
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open-label Clinical Study on Safety and Pharmacokinetics of SHR0410 Injection for Multiple Administration in Hemodialysis Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to evaluate the safety and pharmacokinetics of SHR0410 in patients with hemodialysis.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events [Safety and Tolerability])

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of PK parameter-Area under drug-time curve (AUC0-t)
Assessment of PK parameter-Area under drug-time curve (AUC0-∝)
Assessment of PK parameter-pparent clearance rate (CL)
Assessment of PK parameter-apparent distribution volume (Vz)
Pharmacokinetic-The ratio of AUC0-t after the first and last administration.
The renal clearance rate of SHR0410 in urine after each administration.
The cumulative excretion rate of SHR0410 in urine after each administration.

facility.name: Zhongda Hospital Affiliated to Southeast University
